version_description:
Introducing Version 4.0 - New Templates & Features Live:

What’s new in this version:

- New App design
- New Logo design
- New Highlight covers
- Story template feature
- Background feature
- New Editor
- Bugfix

(Roadmap) - What’s is coming soon?

- Post template feature
- Grid template feature
- Quote template feature
- Poster template feature
- Video Edit feature
- Sticker feature
- Giphy Integration
- Blog
- Editor 2.0

We love hearing your ideas, question or feedback.
Email us at highlightcovers@gmail.com

Introducing Version 4.3 - New Templates & Features Live:

What’s new in this version:

- Quote template feature

- New Logo design
- New Highlight covers
- New Story template
- New Post template
- New Background
- New Editor
- Bugfix

(Roadmap) - What’s is coming soon?


- Grid template feature
- Poster template feature
- Video Edit feature
- Sticker feature
- Giphy Integration
- Blog
- Editor 2.0

We love hearing your ideas, question or feedback.
Email us at highlightcovers@gmail.com

We’re aware that small businesses are the backbone of the economy and now it is very challenging to survive because of the Coronavirus pandemic. Things still change super fast, businesses are being forced to adopt remote working, digitalization and a break for the sales.

As Clay, we are here to help you increase your sales during the Coronavirus pandemic. You can now try Clay for free to design visuals, social media posts, and stories as a business. All of our premium features in the Business section will be free during this time. COVID pandemic has left us with nothing good to say but at least we can be together in the hardest times. We feel your concerns and share the same with you.

What’s new in this version:

- New Quote templates

- Giphy Integration

- Editor 2.0

We love hearing your ideas, question or feedback.

Email us at highlightcovers@gmail.com

You can always approach us for any questions. We look forward to hearing from you. We are here and will be always here #withyou.

Clay

Ready to meet with Clay 5.2?
We've changed the whole branding of Clay! Believe us, It's +1000 cooler now.

The new, cool "Clay" has,
200 new stunning templates added for every category,
Business templates expanded with creating categories such as;
Youtube Cover,
Poster/Flyer,
Invitation,
Banner,
Announcement,
Business Card,
Birthday Card, etc.
Trend based templates added for Story, Post, and Highlight categories.

Plus, We didn't forget the bugs & wishes you requested from us.
All bugs have been solved already. It now has new features more customizable that you love a lot!

Although, we've added +9 new languages to improve your experience!
Now available in:
Filipino,
German,
Indonesian,
Portuguese (Brazil),
Thai,
Dutch,
Russian,
Polish.

Is your language not here? Don't worry, we have already started to work on new.

As we update the app monthly,
Clay will have these features in the next month:

*Video Edit Feature,
*15+ new language,
*Blogs,
*New 400+ templates,
And many more different surprises! Stay tuned.
See you next time!
